data_description.voltage_208: Enable for 208V commercial split-phase systems. Adjusts 2-pole voltage calculations from 240V to 208V.
data_description.read_only: When enabled, trip, on/off, and LED controls are not created. Only sensors and diagnostics are shown.
data_description.calculated_current: Derive amperage from power/voltage instead of the API's rmsCurrent field for higher precision.
data_description.hide_dummy: Hide basic breakers that don't have an LSBMA CT sensor attached.
data_description.stagger_delay: Delay in seconds between each breaker command for All Off, All On, and Trip All buttons.
